OKAY Logo, just let me know ahead of time so I can get my characters off
first. (If you check the defenition in the dictionary you will see that the
referance to KitKat is quite accurate.) Of course I'm tempted to call one of
your characters that just so you WILL blow up the planet, I'm curious about
what kind of timeline we could create.
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 12, 2000 2:55 PM
Subject: Battera is enraged.


> (If one more of my char's get's called a bitch, I'm blowing up the
> planet. Got it? Good. Get creative, but knock off the cussing.  I
> mean, my chars don't go calling the other chars names like that.
> Battera called Vulois a creep.  KitKat refered to Megatron as a
> jerk.  Come on.  Get creative please. Thank you.)
>
